column1: '''Paul Corfield Godfrey''' is a British musician who composed opera adaptations of The Hobbit, The Lord of the Rings and The Silmarillion during the years [[1971]]-[[1986]], with the permission of the [[Tolkien Estate]].
*[http://www.tolkienlibrary.com/press/956-Interview-with-Paul-Corfield-Godfrey.php Interview with Paul Corfield Godfreyl] at tolkienlibrary.com.
